snippet: Alice Munro, the winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature, will be unable to travel to Stockholm to accept her award.
abstract: Alice Munro, winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature, will be unable to travel to Stockholm to accept her award because of health reasons.
lead_paragraph: Alice Munro, the winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature, will be unable to travel to Stockholm to accept her award.

headline.main: Munro Will Miss Nobel Ceremony for Health Reasons
